abstract: Oracle, reporting a 12.5 percent jump in profits in the last quarter, said that it expects the European Union will finally approve its $7.4 billion purchase of Sun Microsystems next month.
snippet: Oracle, reporting a 12.5 percent jump in profits in the last quarter, said that it expects the European Union will finally approve its $7.4 billion purchase of Sun Microsystems next month.
lead_paragraph: Oracle, reporting a 12.5 percent jump in profits in the latest quarter, said that it expected the European Union to finally approve its $7.4 billion purchase of Sun Microsystems next month.

headline.main: Oracle Expects Sun Deal Approval Next Month

abstract: Nasdaq got a lift after Oracle and Research In Motion both beat analysts’ forecasts in earnings reports late Thursday.
snippet: Nasdaq got a lift after Oracle and Research In Motion both beat analysts’ forecasts in earnings reports late Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Volatility marked what was probably the last big trading session of the year on Friday as investors tried to take advantage of better-than-expected profits from technology companies.

headline.main: As Holiday Slowdown Nears, Markets Climb on a Choppy Day of Trading
headline.print_headline: As Holiday Slowdown Nears, Markets Climb on a Choppy Day of Trading
